<implements name="FieldMatrixPreservingVisitor" />
* Default implementation of the {@link FieldMatrixPreservingVisitor} interface. *
* This class is a convenience to create custom visitors without defining all * methods. This class provides default implementations that do nothing. *
* the type of the field elements $Id: DefaultFieldMatrixPreservingVisitor.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $ 2.0
* Zero element of the field.
* Build a new instance. zero additive identity of the field
* {@inheritDoc}
* {@inheritDoc}
* {@inheritDoc}
